title: 07/05/21 DPS Hour 3 Eric Nehm
itunes:title: 07/05/21 DPS Hour 3 Eric Nehm
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Ryan Hollins, in for Dan, discuss the NBA Finals and whether or not there should be a mental asterisk on this year's champion. Ryan explains why he doesn't trust Mike Budenholzer. The guys examine their top-10 players in the NBA, and Ryan tells you why Giannis does not belong in that list. Bucks writer for The Athletic Eric Nehm stops by to give insight on Khris Middleton's excellent postseason. Plus, the guys discuss Chris Paul and what these Finals mean for his career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
